statements: SELECT name, email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_info WHERE saving_goals->>'vacation' = 'Hawaii';
SELECT name, spending_habits->>'monthly_budget' AS monthly_budget FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE name = 'John' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_info WHERE investment_preferences ->> 'risk_level' = 'high';
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE saving_goals ->> 'goal' = 'retirement' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, spending_habits FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, saving_goals FROM customers WHERE spending_habits = 'Frugal'
SELECT customer_name, spending_habits, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, spending_habits FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, saving_goals FROM customers WHERE spending_habits='luxury';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SavingGoals WHERE saving_goal > 5000
SELECT customer_id, total_spending FROM CustomerSpendingHabits ORDER BY total_spending DESC
SELECT customer_id, risk_tolerance FROM InvestmentPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High'
SELECT * FROM CustomerSpendingHabits ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, saving_goal, target_date FROM SavingGoals WHERE target_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CustomerSpendingHabits WHERE total_spending > 1000 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_spending FROM CustomerSpendingHabits WHERE total_spending < 5000 AND last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, saving_goal FROM SavingGoals WHERE target_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY saving_goal ASC;
SELECT customer_id, risk_tolerance, investment_type FROM InvestmentPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Medium' OR risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_spending) AS total_spent FROM CustomerSpendingHabits GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM savings_goals WHERE target_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score >= 4;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT goal_name, target_amount FROM savings_goals WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY target_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, investment_style FROM investment_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN product_recommendations ON customers.customer_id = product_recommendations.customer_id WHERE recommendation_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN investment_preferences ON customers.customer_id = investment_preferences.customer_id WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, spending_habits FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT offer_name, discount_amount, validity_period FROM offers WHERE validity_period > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, transaction_type, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, spending_habits, saving_goals FROM customers WHERE spending_habits = 'Luxury';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
